name: MONSTERS COME OUT
description:
Medication Refusal in Schizophrenia is a common dilemma for physichiatrists, esppecially in a day and age where public knowledge of medication has increased the capability of joe public to make his own choices about his treatments. But for some patients, that capability is out of question. This is a short game based of a case study I read for neuroscience on a patient who refused his treatment with dire consequences. 

NOTE: this is still a work of fiction. The paper was simple a source on inspiration for the type of delusions the patients displayed. 

controls:

-WASD to move

-mouse to control player rotation 

-SPACE to jump

-E to pick up objects/ collect them
